meanings.definition: Relating to or involving the study or documentation of individual characteristics or events.
meanings.sent1: The idiographic approach focuses on understanding each person's unique traits.
meanings.sent2: Researchers use idiographic methods to study specific details about individuals.
meanings.sent3: It was idiographic how each student had a different way of solving the math problem.
meanings.sent4: Her idiographic memory was like a detailed map of her past experiences.
meanings.sent5: The idiographic description of the crime scene made it easy to identify the suspect.
